title: FPS Lag in the new client
body: So i didn't played LOL for 2 weeks, and i am rusty. I updated the client and i started to have fps lag in both in game and client. The reason why i lag in game is because, the client is still open when i am summoned in the summoner rift.

replies.body: FPS issues are generally caused by outdated drivers or bad game files, so it may not necessarily be the new client.  I recommend going through the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to tune up your PC and make sure everything is running in order.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Riot is incapable of admitting their mistakes their ego's are too fragile to permit them to.

Honestly, I've tried most of the steps, It really hasn't helped.

>Updating drivers
>Defragmenting hard-drive
>In-game all low settings
>Disable game dvr (which worked for few weeks)

I had to reset my laptop completely and in the end, nothing worked, thing is, even though my laptop isn't that great, it can at least run League just fine, but now it's dropping to 50 fps, I had to cap my framerate to 80

The client was always open during games, but yeah, I got fps drops aswell. Will reinstall game and get back to you.

edit: yeah reinstalling didn't help at all, it's absoultelly 100% the client.
I have the same problem and I changed all my graphics settings my final decision is doing the "full repair" thing in the menu settings. Edit: Doesn't work :^           )
